(17) National and Local Consumption Taxes

National and local consumption taxes (consumption taxes”) payable by SuMi TRUST Bank and its consolidated subsidiaries in Japan are accounted for by the tax-excluded method. However, any nondeductible consumption taxes associated with asset purchases are recorded as expenses in the current fiscal year.
